workExperience.description: Conducted competitor analysis and supported sales strategy development for cardiovascular and vaccine products. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze market data and deliver insights to improve regional outreach efforts.

Contributed to go-to-market strategy for a biotech client entering the oncology sector. Conducted market sizing, policy analysis, and stakeholder interviews, and synthesized findings into actionable recommendations for the client.

workExperience.projectName: Clinical Rotations - Internal Medicine and Surgery
workExperience.description: Developed structured problem-solving and communication skills through clinical rotations in internal medicine, surgery, and pediatrics. Worked in fast-paced, interdisciplinary teams and gained exposure to complex decision-making under real-world constraints.

projectExperience.description: Led a cross-functional team to design an AI-based screening solution for diabetic retinopathy. Defined project scope, coordinated technical development and evaluation, and presented outcomes at the University Innovation Forum, earning an Excellent Project Award.

Led data analysis and co-authored a peer-reviewed publication on GLP-1 receptor agonists and insulin resistance. Synthesized findings into a structured paper accepted by the Chinese Journal of Endocrinology.

education.description: Trained in clinical medicine with coursework in Pathology, Pharmacology, and Evidence-Based Medicine. Minored in Finance to gain cross-disciplinary insight into healthcare systems and economic decision-making. GPA: 3.8/4.0
